48011d54-1cb6-4220-9082-75d0753d216a.description: The Gateway Assurance™ Review Team Member accreditation badge, verifies that this individual has the proven skills and capability to participate as a team member in the delivery of Gateway Assurance™, and by achieving a 100% progressive testing and final examination pass mark. They have an up-to-date knowledge, and foundational ability, to apply best practice Gateway Assurance™ methods in modern program and project delivery environments.
48011d54-1cb6-4220-9082-75d0753d216a.name: Gateway Assurance™ Review Team Member

alignments.name: Gateway Assurance™
alignments.description: The GDA owned Gateway Assurance™ accreditations and training courses are recognised leading governments, peak industry associations and service delivery organisations, as best practice Gateway Assurance™ training and verifiable accreditation.

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holders have undertaken 7 learning modules, 17 self-paced lessons and have successfully answered all 18 knowledge tests and 9 progressive scenario refreshers . Badge holders have progressed through each learning module after successfully achieving a 100% pass mark for each individual knowledge test, in preparation for their final foundation-level examination.

Badge holders have passed a foundation-level, scenario based examination, which includes 18 randomised multiple choice questions and scoring a 100% pass mark. The foundation-level exam is online and must be completed in a single session.

To retain the best practice Gateway Assurance™ Review Team Member accreditation badge, individuals must log 40 CPD points within a 12-month period of their initial, or their ongoing, annual accreditation date.
This badge is a recommended prerequisite to obtaining the 'Gateway Assurance™ Review Team Leader' accreditation and badge.

9a2da999-f0d3-4d3c-9b04-8769612a22f8.description: The Gateway Assurance™ Review Team Leader accreditation badge, verifies that this individual has the proven skills and capability to lead the delivery of Gateway Assurance™, and possess the abilities to tailor Gateway Assurance™ reviews to given scenarios, and by achieving a 100% progressive testing and final examination pass mark. They have an up-to-date knowledge, and an advanced ability in the leadership of Gateway Assurance™ methods and assurance teams, in modern delivery environments.
9a2da999-f0d3-4d3c-9b04-8769612a22f8.name: Gateway Assurance™ Review Team Leader

alignments.name: Gateway Assurance™
alignments.description: The GDA owned Gateway Assurance™ accreditations and training courses are recognised leading governments, peak industry associations and service delivery organisations, as best practice Gateway Assurance™ training and verifiable accreditation.

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holders have undertaken 7 learning modules, 17 self paced lessons and have successfully answered all 13 knowledge tests 8 progressive scenario refreshers. Badge holders have progressed through each learning module after successfully achieving a 100% pass mark for each individual knowledge test, in preparation for their final examination.

Badge holders have passed a scenario based examination, which includes 16 randomised multiple choice questions and scoring a 100% pass mark. The exam is online and must be completed in a single session.

To retain the best practice Gateway Assurance™ Review Team Leader accreditation badge, individuals must log 60 CPD points within a 12-month period of their initial, or their ongoing, annual accreditation date.
This badge is a recommended prerequisite to obtaining the 'Gateway Assurance™ Master' accreditation and badge.
Gateway Assurance™ Review Team Member

15ea4514-f672-45c3-ab9c-2cf277fbf2da.description: The Agile Assurance™ Professional accreditation and badge, verifies that this individual has the proven skills and capability to deliver Agile Assurance™, and possess the abilities to tailor and deliver Agile Assurance™ to real-world scenarios, and achieving a 100% examination pass mark. Badge holders have a verified up-to-date knowledge, and the ability to apply, best practice Agile Assurance™ to agile projects, in fast-paced and dynamic digital environments.
15ea4514-f672-45c3-ab9c-2cf277fbf2da.name: Agile Assurance™ Professional

alignments.name: Global Agile Assurance
alignments.description: The GDA owned Agile Assurance™ accreditations and training courses are endorsed by the Australian Institute of Project Management, and are recognised by leading governments, peak industry associations and service delivery organisations, as best practice Agile Assurance™ training and verifiable accreditation.

alignments.name: Australian Institute of Project Management
alignments.description: The Agile Assurance™ Professional accreditation and training course has been endorsed by the Australian Institute of Project Management since July 2020.

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holders have undertaken 5 learning modules, 32 self-paced lessons and have successfully answered all 30 progressive knowledge tests. Badge holders have progressed through each learning module after successfully achieving a 100% pass mark for each individual knowledge test, in preparation for their final examination.
Badge holders have passed a scenario based examination, which includes 25 randomised scenario based, multiple choice questions and scoring a 100% pass mark.
To retain the best practice Agile Assurance™ Professional accreditation badge, individuals must log 60 CPD points within a 12-month period of their initial or their ongoing annual accreditation date.
This badge is a prerequisite requirement to obtaining the 'Agile Assurance™ Master' accreditation and badge.

c14630dc-54bf-42c4-be4b-80846f5bf53d.description: The Digital Assurance™ Business Owner accreditation badge, verifies that this individual has the proven ability to maximise the benefits of independent assurance, whilst having the capability to focus on the issues that are most important to more successful program and project outcomes. They have an up-to-date knowledge, and proven ability, to apply best practice assurance methods in modern program and project delivery environments.
c14630dc-54bf-42c4-be4b-80846f5bf53d.name: Digital Assurance™ Business Owner

alignments.name: Digital Assurance™ Business Owner
alignments.description: The GDA owned Digital Assurance™ Business Owner accreditation and training course is endorsed by the Australian Institute of Project Management, and is recognised by leading governments, peak industry associations and service delivery organisations, as best assurance training and verifiable accreditation.

alignments.name: Australian Institute of Project Management
alignments.description: The Digital Assurance™ Business Owner accreditation and training course has been endorsed by the Australian Institute of Project Management since July 2020.

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holders have undertaken 6 learning modules, 19 self-paced lessons and have successfully answered all 17 progressive knowledge tests.  Badge holders have progressed through each learning module after successfully achieving a 100% pass mark for each individual knowledge test, in preparation for their final examination.
Badge holders have passed a scenario based examination, which includes 15 randomised scenario based, multiple choice questions and scoring a 100% pass mark.

To retain the best practice Digital Assurance™ Business Owner accreditation badge, individuals must log 60 CPD points within a 12-month period of their initial, or their ongoing, annual accreditation date.

4374253a-742a-4028-94f9-3e197e2c0e69.description: The Gateway Assurance™ Master accreditation badge, demonstrates that individuals are able to provide high-value, independent assurance services, for organisations in modern delivery environments. They are acknowledged as Gateway Assurance™ experts, having a proven and independent panel verified capabilities of their ongoing mastery of Gateway Assurance™, and possess a superior understanding and ability to apply best practice Gateway Assurance™ methods and techniques.
4374253a-742a-4028-94f9-3e197e2c0e69.name: Gateway Assurance™ Master

alignments.name: Global Gateway™ Assurance
alignments.description: The GDA owned Gateway Assurance™ accreditations and training courses are recognised leading governments, peak industry associations and service delivery organisations - as best practice Gateway Assurance™ training and verifiable accreditation.

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holders have been accredited by an independent assessment panel, having proven that they have led agile assurance reviews in a preceding 12-month period and have evidenced and verified referees for the Gateway Assurance™ reviews they have led. Badge holders have previously obtained Gateway Assurance™ Review Team Leader accreditation and badge.

To retain the best practice Gateway Assurance™ Masters’ accreditation, badge holders have been re-accredited on a 2-yearly basis, continuing to provide evidence that they have led agile assurance reviews in a preceding 2-year period and have evidenced and verified referees for the Gateway Assurance™ reviews they have led.
Gateway Assurance™ Review Team Leader

3e0dfb1e-7530-4f1b-8bf1-b83231465114.description: The Agile Assurance™ Master accreditation badge, demonstrates that individuals are able to provide high-value, independent assurance services, for organisations in modern agile delivery environments. They are acknowledged as Agile Assurance™ experts, having a proven and independent panel verified capabilities of their ongoing mastery of Agile Assurance™, and possess a superior understanding and ability to apply best practice Agile Assurance™ methods and techniques.
3e0dfb1e-7530-4f1b-8bf1-b83231465114.name: Agile Assurance™ Master

alignments.name: Agile Assurance™
alignments.description: The Agile Assurance™ accreditations and training courses are recognised by leading governments, peak industry associations and service delivery organisations, as best practice for Agile Assurance™ accreditation training.

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holders have been accredited by an independent assessment panel, having proven that they have led agile assurance reviews in a preceding 12-month period and have evidenced and verified referees for the (agile) assurance reviews they have led. Badge holders have previously obtained 'Agile Assurance™ Professional' accreditation and badge.

To retain the best practice Agile Assurance™ Masters’ accreditation, badge holders have been re-accredited on a 2-yearly basis, continuing to provide evidence that they have led (agile) assurance reviews in a preceding 2-year period, and have evidenced and verified referees for those nominated reviews.
Agile Assurance™ Professional
